title: Ticket #3770: shim_dmtcp should check DMTCP's version
description: shim_dmtcp has minimum required versions. For example the upcoming shim_dmtcp 0.6 requires DMTCP 1.2.8 or later. shim_dmtcp should detect the version of DMTCP ("./dmtcp_command --version") and emit a non-fatal warning if it's too old. (It can be fatal, but then we need to be absolutely sure we've detected it correctly. It would suck to inappropriately reject a newer version because we can't parse it.)
creator: adesmet
